00044 GUIEventControl::GUIEventControl() {}

00050 
00051 SUMOTime
00052 GUIEventControl::addEvent(Command* operation,
00053                           SUMOTime execTimeStep,
00054                           AdaptType type) {
00055     myLock.lock();
00056     SUMOTime ret = MSEventControl::addEvent(operation, execTimeStep, type);
00057     myLock.unlock();
00058     return ret;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 void
00063 GUIEventControl::execute(SUMOTime execTime) {
00064     myLock.lock();
00065     try {
00066         MSEventControl::execute(execTime);
00067     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00068         myLock.unlock();
00069         throw;
00070     }
00071     myLock.unlock();
00072 }
